name: suite-key
effect: Opens the locked building in the lakeside resort.
short_effect: Opens a locked building in the Lakeside Resort.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: A key to one of the suites at the luxury hotel by a lake. For some odd reason, it often disappears.
flavor_text.platinum: A key to one of the suites at the luxury hotel by a lake. For some odd reason, it often disappears.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: A key to one of the suites at the luxury hotel by a lake. For some odd reason, it often disappears.
